title: ra ra raghuveerA
sahitya:
rArA raghuvIrA dhIrA

anupallavi

 rArA shrI dasharatha rAja vara kumAra 
rArA sundarAkAra rArA sukumAra

caraNam 1

 rArA shrI rAmapura vAsA rArA karuNAsAndrA 
rArA bhAnu kulEndrA rArA upEndraku
 
caraNam 2

 rAmacandrapura vAsa rArA rAmabhadrA 
rArA rAmadAsuni brOva rAghava ati vEgamE
